Azure Active Directory

A modern service based on REST provides cloud identity authentication and access control for applications.

Apply for trial Purchase now

Azure Active Directory is a comprehensive and highly available marking and access control cloud solution. It combines core directory services, advanced marking supervision and application access control. Azure Active Directory also provides a standards-based platform with abundant functions which supports developers in providing access control for applications based on centralized policies and rules.

Azure Active Directory currently provides free levels. For details on the list of functions, please see the table below.

The free version of Azure Active Directory covers cloud application access and self-help identify management of working staff with priority requirements for the cloud.

One example of the objects is to be used for user entry for identity authentication. If you need to exceed this default usage quota, please contact the support staff.

Support and Service Level Agreements

If you have any questions or need any help, please access Azure Support to select self-help service or any other methods to contact us for support.

The free version of Azure Active Directory doesn’t provide a service level agreement. If you want to learn more about the details of the server level agreement, please visit the Service Level Agreement page.
